title: Password Recovery
content:
Hello,

I am trying to login to my Mozilla account so that I can backup my data and move it onto a new computer. However, even though Sync is activated, I cannot find my Mozilla Firefox password anywhere and am unsure of what it is. Is there anyway that someone who works at Mozilla can give me access to my password?

I am happy to verify my identity and prove that this is indeed my account, but I am not sure of how to go about doing so. I really need access to all of my data, and would be highly thankful for any assistance regarding this matter.
creator: mlicastri12

title: Firefox Slow to Load Youtube with Ublock Origin
content: As the title says, it is very slow with Ublock Origin. I have refreshed Firefox and without Ublock it obviously works but I would like to keep the extension because it is the only one that works with Youtube Ads right now.
creator: allenjftipay10

title: Outlook Freezing up Internet
content: With these updates the way Firefox handles Outlook seems to get worse and worse. I don't have these problems if I switch to Edge. If I'm watching streamers on Twitch the streams pause while Outlook loads. It didn't used to do this. Something about that mail service is really hanging up the browser and it struggles more and more. There is always delay as it tries to load everything. The first email will take a while before it loads up. Sometimes if I close the tab and open a new one and try again it loads up faster. I've have all my cookies reset with this recent firefox update, everything got wiped for some reason, but getting them set up again doesn't help it. Clearing Cache hasn't helped it.
creator: yamano

title: how do I stop amazon from my search results
content: Give me a way to stop amazon from my search result page.
creator: mwardell22

title: "503 Service Unavailable" message when tryinng to go to https://accesspeople.accessacloud.com/
content:
Hello,

I have the latest release of Firefox on windows 11.

When I try to access accesspeople.accessacloud.com, the site I use to see my work's rota, the website doesn't work and shows this message;

" 503 Service Unavailable No server is available to handle this request. "


This website works fine with Chrome, Opera, Edge, etc.

I have tried disabling all extensions, turing off tracking, as well as clearing the cookies and cache for the site and still no luck.

Please let me know if you know of any solutions.

Thanks
creator: joshldaniel73

title: Contraseña
content: Mi cuenta sincronizada de repente dejó de pedir la maestra o primaria, traté de buscarla o cambiarla pero no me deja, no existe ya ninguna de mis claves protegidas, qué hago. ¿Hay que crear una maestra nueva y empezar a recuperar claves de todos mis sitios para almacenar de nuevo?
creator: JoseGabriel
